availableRewards(address,bytes32,address.details: Return the withdrawable rewards for a contributor.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

availableRewards(address,bytes32,address.return: The amount withdrawable per round per request.

fetchArbitrable(address).details: Fetch arbitrable TCR data in a single call.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.

fetchArbitrable(address).return: The latest data on an arbitrable TCR contract.

getItem(address,bytes32).details: Fetch the latest data on an item in a single call.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

getItemData(address,bytes32).details: Fetch data of the an item and return a struct.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

getItemRequests(address,bytes32).details: Fetch all requests for an item.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

getLatestRequestData(address,bytes32).details: Fetch the latest request of item.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

getLatestRoundRequestData(address,bytes3.details: Fetch the latest round of the latest request of an item.

params._address: The address of the LightGeneralized TCR to query.
params._itemID: The ID of the item to query.

devdoc.title: LightGeneralizedTCRView A view contract to fetch, batch, parse and return GTCR contract data efficiently. This contract includes functions that can halt execution due to out-of-gas exceptions. Because of this it should never be relied upon by other contracts.
